. Type species:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remark: According to Lindskog (1995 : 125), earlier records from North America refer to a brachypterous form of
M. ripula Drake
(=
bergrothi (Jakovlev))
.

Micracanthia minor (Hamid & Sultana, 1972)
[p. 334, as
Saldula minor
]
